saya looked shaken and shocked at her own tentacles vanishing like they had been vaporized.

name: asagi
normalized: uohh!
ohh!
unknowingly, cracks appeared in the asphalt and pebbles flew up into the air from the aftermath of the outburst.

name: oboro's clone
normalized: th, this is…
oboro's clone looked on in astonishment while holding her wounds.

name: sakura
normalized: o, onee, chan…
sakura slowly collapsed while bleeding profusely.
that event had elevated my outburst, making the ground shake intensely.

name: oboro's clone
normalized: i see…, this, is your real self, isn't it…

name: asagi
normalized: uohh!
ohh!

name: man
normalized: hi, hii…

name: man
normalized: wh, what the, this…, is a joke, isn't it!
the ryuumon soldiers began to scramble away from the plaza, startled by my bizarre presence and roar.
the ryuumon building began to shake.
the windowpanes broke and cracks began traveling up the concrete walls.
large fragments from the building started falling down and scattering with the repeated shaking of the ground.
when it seemed as if the entire building was on the verge of crumbling down, i transformed into a brilliant radiance, binding my spirit to the emitting chaos.

name: asagi
normalized: fu--!
i spat out a deep…, deep breath.
every cell in my body felt hot, like they were burning, but that fever gradually subsided.
and then, the fusion was complete.
i understood in full that my body had transfigured.
眼球の色素が変化し、毛細血管が強く浮き上がり、その瞳が赤く変色していた。
my fingertips had sharp variations to them i felt something, like a shell of armor, clinging to the skin of my body.
i was not afraid.
just that my consciousness had regained its composure and was controlled by only one thing: an intent to kill.

name: asagi
normalized: sayaa!
my red eyes dyed with hatred turned to the little monstrous girl.

name: saya
normalized: whoa!
that was awesome, asagi-oneesamaa!
saya was greatly delighted seeing my transfiguration.

name: saya
normalized: ahahaa…, you look so cool!
in the next moment i was dashing towards saya.
jyuruu, jyururururuu!

name: saya
normalized: asagi-oneesama!
her tentacles, sharp as knives, streamed forth at me all at once.
but, they had all evaporated away before even reaching my skin.
just the stench of those pointed ends hung about in the air, like they had been consumed by dreadfully high temperatures.
victory was already in my grasp.
it didn't matter how many tentacles she threw at me if they never even reached her opponent.
i pressed hard on saya.
doshun!
our two bodies melded.
amidst snagging with each other, one overcame the other's resistance and totally expelled the other one off.
it was saya that was overmatched.
zazazazazaa!
while brushing her attacks away, the lower half of saya's body scooped out the ground of the plaza.

name: saya
normalized: --ehbuu!
our activity finally ended with her crashing into the thick wall of the building.
a cloud of dust whirled up.
my outburst of emotions quickly scattered forth in all directions.

name: saya
normalized: ubuu…, geboh…
saya's body, sunken into the concrete wall, was hidden partially by the rubble.
and then, my right arm pierced deeply in the upper part of saya's human body near to her heart.
it had gone through saya and encroached into the wall behind her.
the deep fissure carving into her center by my encroaching arm told how grave the impact was.
crimson blood erupted out from the wound.
even if she had transformed into a monster, it seemed as if it had not changed the location of her heart.
a paleness grew on her face right away.
no matter how strong her monster form was, it appeared she could not live with a smashed heart.

name: saya
normalized: uguu, geboh…, asagi-oneesama, you were impatient…
the little girl smiled while spitting up blood.

name: saya
normalized: it's all right…, sakura-oneechan won't die

name: asagi
normalized: …wha!?

name: saya
normalized: saya wasn't aiming…, for her vitals…
the evil unearthliness disappeared from the little girl.

name: asagi
normalized: what do you mean?

name: saya
normalized: hehehe…, l, like i said, i missed her vitals…, so that saya wouldn't kill her…

name: asagi
normalized: …why, did you miss her vitals?

name: saya
normalized: why, sakura-oneechan…, saya had to kill her…, uguu, gebohh

name: asagi
normalized: you mean…, you were betraying oboro?

name: saya
normalized: …it would've made oboro-oneesama mad…, i wonder…, but…, i just wanted to play with sakura-oneechan a little longer…
red blood continued to sluggishly pour out.
there was already no one who could stop that kind of bleeding.

name: saya
normalized: you see…, i wanted to play with her a lot on other islands…, a lot…, and a lot.

name: asagi
normalized: what is your…, real name?

name: saya
normalized: my real name?
what is that…

name: asagi
normalized: …no, it's nothing

name: asagi
normalized: （あのクローンが言っていたことが本当なら、自殺した誰かが元になっているということになるけど…）
i had thought she had been built somehow using oboro's own cell structure.
but i never heard anything to discount that the little girl that had been kidnapped may have had ninja blood in her from the missing taimanin.
i only knew this, there was no longer a grotesque- looking monster in front of my eyes now.

name: saya
normalized: a, a lot…, and a lot, i wanted to play…

name: asagi
normalized: what things did you want to play?

name: saya
normalized: …umm…, let me see…, what was it, i wonder.
i'm sleepy…, i can't remember very well…

name: asagi
normalized: saya…

name: saya
normalized: since saya is…already worn-out, she's going to bed, huh…

name: asagi
normalized: yes, you're right…, you had better go to bed soon

name: saya
normalized: are you mad at saya…?

name: asagi
normalized: no, i'm not mad

name: saya
normalized: …really?

name: asagi
normalized: really.
i'm not mad at you

name: saya
normalized: …onee-sama…, thank you…, know what…, sakura-oneesama, is also…

name: asagi
normalized: what about sakura?

name: asagi
normalized: --saya?
saya's pierced body was quickly becoming light.

name: asagi
normalized: saya!?
what did you want to say about sakura?
i had called her name, but her entire body had emitted a bluish white radiance and was beginning to vanish into a dust.
it resembled something akin to the vampires of the underworld when they were destroyed.
in compensation for their strong bodies, their cells held a weak genetic make-up that broke down.

name: asagi
normalized: saya…, sayaa!
more easily than a collapsing sand castle, she had vanished.
it was as if she had never been there at all.

name: asagi
normalized: kuu--
my arm, dripping with saya's blood, was all that remained.
there was nothing more than that.
and with it, the little girl's true name and true character--

name: asagi
normalized: oboro--!
i turned my mounting emotions towards oboro.
but, oboro's clone was not to be found.
it looked as if she had vanished somewhere in the time i was fighting with saya.

name: asagi
normalized: oboroo!
it was just my angry bellow that echoed between the chasms of the buildings.
